title: Handwritten Text on ruled pages
body:
- The API fails to detect text if the note was written on ruled pages.
- Remove horizontal lines from the image that is sent to API.

title: Image upload takes a lot of time
body:
- Most mobile images are very big, so upload takes a lot of time.
- Resize image either in browser or on server.

title: Create Profile Pages
body: For each student and course create a profile page showing their notes in chronological order. The notes should be visible only if you are following the student or course.

title: Show the uploaded image along with the note
body: The image uploaded from the mobile app should be shown with the note.

title: Search Bar
body:
User should be able to search for notes based on date and title.

- if on your own feed, then search from that feed.
- if on someone whom you follow, search from their feed.
- if on a course which you follow, search from that feed.
- don't show search bar if not following.

title: Comment Functionality
body: Users who are following a student or a course should be allowed to comment on the notes made by that students or notes made in that course.

title: Follow Functionality
body: Users should be allowed to follow courses and friends.
